docs.snippet: Nicknamed "Duterte Harry," after a Clint Eastwood character with little regard for rules, the Philippine city mayor casually threatens to shoot criminals, hang them using laundry line or drown them in Manila Bay. His expletives have sideswiped eve...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nicknamed "Duterte Harry," after a Clint Eastwood character with little regard for rules, the Philippine city mayor casually threatens to shoot criminals, hang them using laundry line or drown them in Manila Bay. His expletives have sideswiped even the deeply revered pope.

headline.main: Philippine Mayor Guns for Presidency With Vow to Bury Crime
headline.print_headline: Philippine Mayor Guns for Presidency With Vow to Bury Crime
